definition: an act that brings discredit to the person who does it, to make a spot or mark onto
details:
noun
- an act that brings discredit to the person who does it
= example: an act that brings discredit to the person who does it
= synonyms: stain
- a blemish made by dirt
= synonyms: smear, smirch, spot, daub, smudge, slur
verb
- to make a spot or mark onto
= example: to make a spot or mark onto
= synonyms: spot
- to dry with blotting paper
= example: to dry with blotting paper
